name: make_symmetric
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Registers an input image to its left/right reversed version using mri_robust_register in a half-way space and mirrors the selected hemisphere.

inputs.description: The hemisphere to mirror; accepted values are 'lh' for left hemisphere or 'rh' for right hemisphere.
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Output image in .mgz format resulting from the symmetric processing.
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Transformation map in .lta format mapping the input to the upright space.
inputs.name: Transform map file

output-files.description: Transformation map file mapping the input to the upright space.
output-files.name: Transform map output file
